name: Astro Run
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 42. Made this game a little slower than most Ludum Dares, so there are a few bugs and messy features I didn't get to. Fairly happy with the idea, execution... not so much. Lot of room to expand though, so hopefully I can make it a full game some day.

Controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys

Shoot (Only available in Weapon Ship): Space

Objective:

Make you're way through space, stopping in at planets to slow down and avoid being overrun by meteors, and building up warp energy until you can escape through a worm hole.

You need 300 energy before you can enter worm holes.

You must be in a ship to enter or leave planets.

Ships:

Basic Ship - Nothing special, but good enough to enter and leave planets.

Solar Ship - Can absorb suns to gain extra warp energy, but this damages the ship. Can also enter and leave planets.

Weapon Ship - Can shoot a powerful blast vaporising all objects in its path, but using this weapon damages the ship. Can also enter and leave planets.
